pullRequest.title: [FLINK-15430][table-planner-blink] Fix Java 64K method compiling limi…
pullRequest.bodyText:
…tation for blink planner

What is the purpose of the change
Fix blink planner code generation exceeds 64k java method limitation.
Brief change log

Add isSplit field in CodeGeneratorContext
Split expressions when exceeds threshold in ExprCodeGenerator
Use reuseableLocalVariable in GeneratedExpression.deepCopy

Verifying this change
This change added tests and can be verified as follows:

CalcITCase. testLongProjectionList

commit.message: [FLINK-15430][table-planner-blink] Fix Java 64K method compiling limitation for blink planner
Change MatchCodeGenerator to declare reusable local variables

Revert "Change MatchCodeGenerator to declare reusable local variables"

This reverts commit 263bb0c191d7090cc1971a4973fc9153bfffc024.
Add allowSplit param, to narrow down code split scope

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -285,11 +287,30 @@ class ExprCodeGenerator(ctx: CodeGeneratorContext, nullableInput: Boolean)
       case _ => // ok
     }
 
-    val setFieldsCode = fieldExprs.zipWithIndex.map { case (fieldExpr, index) =>
+    val setFieldsCodes = fieldExprs.zipWithIndex.map { case (fieldExpr, index) =>
       val pos = fieldExprIdxToOutputRowPosMap.getOrElse(index,
         throw new CodeGenException(s"Illegal field expr index: $index"))
       baseRowSetField(ctx, returnTypeClazz, outRow, pos.toString, fieldExpr, outRowWriter)
-    }.mkString("\n")
+    }
+    val totalLen = setFieldsCodes.map(_.length).sum
+    val maxCodeLength = ctx.tableConfig.getMaxGeneratedCodeLength
+    val setFieldsCode = if (allowSplit && totalLen > maxCodeLength) {
+      // do the split.
+      ctx.setSplit()
+      setFieldsCodes.map(project => {
+        val methodName = newName("split")
+        val method =
+          s"""
+            |private void $methodName() throw Exception {

nodes.bodyText:
Rename the variable to isCodeSplit to make it clear that the code is splitted?
The comment can also be improved Flag that indicates whether the generated code is split into several methods.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -108,6 +108,11 @@ class CodeGeneratorContext(val tableConfig: TableConfig) {
     */
   private var currentMethodNameForLocalVariables = "DEFAULT"
 
+  /**
+   * Flag indicating whether split has occurred.
+   */
+  private var isSplit = false

nodes.bodyText: enableCodeSplit() or setCodeSplit()?  Please also add Javadoc above this method.
